/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Cars and buses fill the streets, hinting at the city's constant movement and energy. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
